Key Match Events: Bahrain scored an equalizer in the 90+9th minute after the referee allowed nine minutes of extra time instead of the standard six minutes.
Post-Match Reflections: Indonesian coach Shin Tae-yong expressed disappointment with the referee's decision, calling it biased and embarrassing.Indonesian players protested the referee's decision, leading to the manager receiving a red card.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Referee Ahmed Al Kaf, known for issuing many yellow cards, gave three yellow cards in the match, two to Indonesia and one to Bahrain.Bahrain experienced a significant decline in FIFA ranking, dropping two positions, while Indonesia remained at 129th position.
Others: The match was held at Bahrain National Stadium, Riffa.Indonesia almost won the match but were denied in the ninth minute of injury time due to the referee's controversial decision.
